name: Dark White
description:
Dark White is a quick 10-minute game that can be played straight from your browser. It was made in 15 hours for the B&W game jam. It is about a grey cube stuck in a black and white world. Follow along with the unique storyline in this fun little game!

How to play:

Use the Left & Right arrow keys or A & D to go left and right and use the space bar to jump (You have unlimited jump!). Hold the key to stick to the wall!
